text: The level of transparency with which we’re approaching our September end-of-quarter fundraising deadline is unprecedented—that’s because we know the only way we’ll succeed is by uniting around a common goal. Text TOGETHER to 40203 to get daily updates on our progress.

Thank you, Sara! Proud to stand alongside you and @UAW. Unions built the middle class, and unions will rebuild the middle class. https://twitter.com/FlyingWithSara/status/1175913582694981632 QT @FlyingWithSara I see a lot of 😊 on the picket line (sure, feels good to own our power and have each other’s backs), but this face of grit and determination from @ewarren is the one we need to help GM understand we’re going to be here one day longer, one day stronger than them. #1u

RT @YoBenCohen No one should be afraid to go to the doctor because they think they’ll go broke. No one should leave the hospital bankrupt. I’m with @BernieSanders — we must #EliminateMedicalDebt. https://berniesanders.com/en/issues/eliminating-medical-debt/

Our plan for education:

✅ Make public colleges, universities and trade schools tuition-free and debt-free
✅ Cancel student debt
✅ Invest in HBCUs and minority-serving institutions
✅ End equity gaps in higher education attainment
✅ Tax Wall Street speculation to pay for it

We're coming up against our most critical end-of-quarter yet. “In many ways, the climate crisis is a product, it’s an externality, of our unsustainable way of life, & you don’t fix that with a solar panel,

You fix it by changing the way we think & operate as a society.

We‘ve done it before, & can do it again.”
